<!--This file is generated-->

- Fix(@roots/bud-extensions): direct use webpack plugins not being called

<!--truncate-->

:::info Updates available

There are patches available for [this release](https://bud.js.org/releases/tags/6-6). Please update to [6.6.2](https://bud.js.org/releases/6.6.2).

:::

- Test: add unit test covering plugins added by signifier: `bud.extensions.add('some-webpack-plugin')`
- Test: add unit test covering plugins added as instance: `bud.extensions.add(new SomeWebpackPlugin())`
- Test: add unit test covering plugins added as simple object: `bud.extensions.add({apply: () => void 0})`
